feed.title: Combined summary - Why soft-forks? was: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!

entry.title: Combined summary - Why soft-forks? was: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!
entry.summary: The article talks about a speaker who is questioning the purpose of certain practices in the Bitcoin industry. The speaker is curious about where ordinary Bitcoin users stand to gain despite there being clear downsides to some of these practices. They are seeking a direct answer to this question.It is not clear what specific practices the speaker is referring to, but it is implied that they may be related to issues such as security, privacy, or accessibility for everyday users of Bitcoin. Despite potential drawbacks, the speaker seems to believe that there must be some benefit to these practices that outweighs the downsides.The article does not provide any answers to the speaker's question, but instead focuses on their search for an explanation. It is suggested that the speaker is looking for a more in-depth understanding of how the Bitcoin industry works and how it benefits its users.Overall, the article highlights the importance of critical thinking and questioning in the Bitcoin industry. Despite its many advantages, there are still areas where improvement is needed, and it is up to individuals to challenge the status quo and seek out better solutions.
